## Exercise 4.11

```{r}
data("ReligionGDP")
plot(log(GDP)~Religiosity, data = ReligionGDP)
religion_gdp_model <- lm(log(GDP)~Religiosity, data = ReligionGDP)
abline(religion_gdp_model)
summary(religion_gdp_model)
plot(rstudent(religion_gdp_model)~religion_gdp_model$fitted.values)
abline(0, 0)
rstudent(religion_gdp_model)[25]
```
